name: The Destiny of Kings: Oil Paintings w/ Digital Technology

metadata.name: Act I : God of War
metadata.description:
War has awakened. Each individual brush stroke, created to mimic Ares unique fighting style. Brutal. Yet, matching the digital technology forged in the wood-panel frame. This marks the first collaboration between Aeneas Middleton and Muhju, who designed "Ares", the digital art displayed on the tablet.

"You face the God of War."


NFT PACKAGE INCLUDES:  
(1) 1/1 “Act I: God of War” NFT of oil painting/digital collab  
(2) 1/1 “ARES” NFT minted/air-dropped by Muhju on SuperRare  
(3) Oil Painting 36in x 36in (91.44cm x 91.44cm) - [Includes IO tablet installed, and charging cord for “Ares” tablet]
